page.title: 09JULY 19TH. 1985
page.content: Today was the last day of the school year. It was no ordinary final day. It was the day Warley Junior School was closing. Not only were the 4th. years leaving to go to a new school, in a way we were all leaving. Our school is being amalgamated with the Warley Infant School because of falling numbers. The new Warley Primary School will be in the existing junior school, and the infant building in Essex Way will be closed. During the holiday the infant books and equipment are to be moved into the junior building. Some alterations are going to be made to create more space and a new central resource area where all the library books will be kept. So today it is "Goodbye, Warley Junior School." and "Hello and best wishes to Warley Primary School."
